verses.verse: Praise <S%H8416><s%> waits <S%H1747><s%> for you, <S%H430><s%> God, in Zion. <S%H6726><s%> To you shall vows <S%H5088><s%> be performed. <S%H7999><s%>
You who hear <S%H8085><s%> prayer, <S%H8605><s%> to you all men <S%H1320><s%> will come. <S%H935><s%>
Sins <S%H1697><s%> overwhelmed <S%H1396><s%> me, <S%H3722><s%> but you atoned for our transgressions. <S%H6588><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is one whom you choose, <S%H977><s%> and cause to come near, <S%H7126><s%> that he may live <S%H7931><s%> in your courts. <S%H2691><s%> We will be filled <S%H7646><s%> with the goodness <S%H2898><s%> of your house, <S%H1004><s%> your holy <S%H6918><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>

By awesome deeds <S%H3372><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> you answer <S%H6030><s%> us, <S%H430><s%> God of our salvation. <S%H3468><s%> You who are the hope <S%H4009><s%> of all the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> of those who are far away <S%H7350><s%> on the sea; <S%H3220><s%>
Who by his power <S%H3581><s%> forms <S%H3559><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> having armed <S%H247><s%> yourself with strength; <S%H1369><s%>
who stills <S%H7623><s%> the roaring <S%H7588><s%> of the seas, <S%H3220><s%> the roaring <S%H7588><s%> of their waves, <S%H1530><s%> and the turmoil <S%H1995><s%> of the nations. <S%H3816><s%>

They also who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in faraway places <S%H7099><s%> are afraid <S%H3372><s%> at your wonders. <S%H226><s%> You call the morning <S%H1242><s%>'s dawn <S%H1242><s%> and the evening <S%H6153><s%> with songs of joy. <S%H7442><s%>

You visit <S%H6485><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and water <S%H7783><s%> it. <S%H7227><s%> You greatly enrich <S%H6238><s%> it. <S%H6388><s%> The river of God <S%H430><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%> You provide <S%H3559><s%> them grain, <S%H1715><s%> for so you have ordained it. <S%H3559><s%>

You drench <S%H7301><s%> its <S%H7301><s%> furrows. <S%H1417><s%> You level <S%H5181><s%> its ridges. <S%H8525><s%> You soften <S%H4127><s%> it with showers. <S%H7241><s%> You bless <S%H1288><s%> it with a crop. <S%H6780><s%>
You crown <S%H5849><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> with your bounty. <S%H2896><s%> Your carts <S%H4570><s%> overflow <S%H7491><s%> with abundance. <S%H1880><s%>
The wilderness <S%H4057><s%> grasslands <S%H4999><s%> overflow. <S%H7491><s%> The hills <S%H1389><s%> are clothed <S%H2296><s%> with gladness. <S%H1524><s%>

The pastures <S%H3733><s%> are covered <S%H3847><s%> with flocks. <S%H6629><s%> The valleys <S%H6010><s%> also are clothed <S%H5848><s%> with grain. <S%H1250><s%> They shout for joy! <S%H7321><s%> They also sing. <S%H7891><s%>
